column4: i dont know what happened but when I try to shift my applications to other workspace....it shows me Desk 1 (1), Desk 2 (2)..... and so on instead of normally showing Desk 1, Desk 2...and my applications seems to be running slower than usual
please don't repeat your problem quickly...sometimes answers aren't available.  could you post a screenshot to http://tinyurl.com/imagebin?
(the imagebin should be without the "?" -- sorry)    :)
what screenshot should i show
something that shows your issue, because (at least to me) it didn't make very much sense...
see this my desktop folder: http://imagebin.org/104882
and this is my actual desktop showing no files or folders: http://imagebin.org/104884
your screenshots don't sho any problems that I can see...could you please try to explain your problem in detail?  Please see the factoid below
did you see my desktop folder in the 1st screenshot showing files and folders....and in the 2nd screen shot is the desktop where i dont see the files
I saw both...and there's no indication of anything you were talking about when you originally described your issue

originally i talked about something else i understand....i'll tell what i was telling you before.....in case you want to shift your firefox application from Workspace 1 to worskpace 2..... you right click it and select Move to another Workspace....then you select Desk 1 or Desk 2 or so on...right...did you get me till here??
got you so far :)
but it no longer shows me that way....instead of showing me Desk 1, Desk 2....it shows me the options as Desk 1 (1), Desk 2 (2) and so on...... got it??
Ok I understand...is it just with firefox or is it with all applications?
with all applications
ok...give me a few minutes to see if I can find anything that will help
and my 2nd problem is that my desktop is not showing me the files i originally had
okk take your time...
i posted my problem here...http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=9576630#post9576630  I am leaving...so in case you fins something please do post there
will do.
thank you...bye
